title: Baalveer
genres: Action & Adventure, Family, Kids, Sci-Fi & Fantasy
overview: Returning for Season 3, Baalveer, a young superhero who fights evil forces with his magical powers and protects children from harm, is unaware of his scheming superiors' plan to betray him. Stripped of his powers and identity, he leads a mundane life until an unexpected event reignites his abilities. With help from Kaashvi, a girl he partners up with, he embarks on a journey to reclaim his powers and identity while battling his enemies. Will Baalveer become the ultimate hero he once was?
